content: tote measures approximately 11 wide x 8 high 28 cm x 20 3 cm scarf measures approximately 4 1/2 wide x 54 long 11 4 cm x 137 cm the tote is made with 2 strands of super saver and one strand of light & lofty held together the scarf is made with 2 strands of super saver held together and edged with one strand of light & lofty also available at purple kitty yarns website 1 1 http //purplekittyyarns com/purse-patternseg html
